Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <jl777c> with the new hashing getting 50MH on decent systems, thats 20 nanoseconds per hash!, it is interesting that much older systems are getting close to the same and the fastest at 75MH or so. this update has really leveled the playing field. The ideal mining "rig" would seem to be a dozen old laptops instead of a GPU

Content: [dscrdvrsc] <karero> @jl777c very succint observation ðŸ˜ƒ

Author: Gateway#3763

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrdvrsc] <miketout> Thank you @TexWiller !
On another topic, based on the significant rise in hash rate, I think we can safely say that if there were any GPU miners active, they have been completely out hashed by this upgrade ðŸ˜ƒ sometime, we will find out if GPUs can keep up with this. if they can, i am doubtful that they'll be competitive at similar power draw. hopefully CPUs will now be useful miners for quite some time

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <AkiraX> @miketout. Has anyone ever mentioned how coincidental the timing of the upgrade was?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <AkiraX> Same time as halfing?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <AkiraX> Was this for marketing purposes?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> We were forced into the timing. Someone working on a GPU miner first led me to believe that GPUs were going to be a threat to CPUs and then also discovered that this was possible and mined at least one block with the the method. Prior to that, we had left the option to close this method off or use it at some point. We had to decide immediately, and after a lot of calculating, determined that providing it to everyone would be the best chance to keep CPUs viable indefinitely, so we chose that option. Exact timing was coincidental and definitely not the most convenient personally. End result is better than I thought it would be on perf, which I guess is good for those of us in the community who would like to see Verus succeed ðŸ˜ƒ

Author: Gateway#3763

Author: Gateway#3763

Author: Gateway#3763

Author: Gateway#3763
